attributes.action: make it an offence to single out at 4x4s and there drivers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The 4x4 Tax as it has become known encompases many more vehicles than 4x4s so why are people picking on 4x4s only
why not the people carrier tax!
not only should enging emisions be taken into account, but also the "birth to death" co2 emisions of cars.
this would make the much loved hy-brid car a higher poluter than a large 4x4,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
